current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To provide for the counting on January 4,
		  2013, of the electoral votes for President and Vice President of the United
		  States.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Vice President
			 of the United States

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be their Presiding
			 Officer; that two tellers shall be previously appointed by the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Speaker of the House of Representatives

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , to whom shall be handed, as they are opened by the

, all the certificates and papers purporting to be
			 certificates of the electoral votes, which certificates and papers shall be
			 opened, presented, and acted upon in the alphabetical order of the States,
			 beginning with the letter

, who shall thereupon announce the state of the vote, which announcement
			 shall be deemed a sufficient declaration of the persons, if any, elected

, and, together with a list of
			 the votes, be entered on the Journals of the two Houses.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Vice President of the United States

term.#tail:
; and said tellers, having then read
			 the same in the presence and hearing of the two Houses, shall make a list of
			 the votes as they shall appear from said certificates; and the votes having
			 been ascertained and counted in the manner and according to the rules by law
			 provided, the result of the same shall be delivered to the

text.#text:
That the two Houses of Congress shall
			 meet in the Hall of the House of Representatives on Thursday, the 4th day of
			 January 2013, at 1 o'clock post meridian, pursuant to the requirements of the
			 Constitution and laws relating to the election of

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SCON 1 ATS: To provide for the counting on January 4, 2013, of the electoral votes for President and Vice President of the United States.
